DOC.brief_summary: The technique of sentinel lymph node mapping in patients with colon cancer varies among reports, and the optimal method remain to be established. The purpose of this study was to determine the optimal injection technique for sentinel lymph node mapping for colon cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between ex Vivo and in Vivo Injection of Blue Dye in Sentinel Lymph Node Mapping for Colon Cancer
DOC.criteria: Stage I III colon cancer patients cancer located at the low rectum which were located within 10 cm of the dentate, recurrent or metastatic colon carcinoma, adjacent organ invasion tumor, prior chemotherapy or radiation, cancer with intestinal obstruction, past intestinal surgery
